fullName.jp: クラウド・ストライフ

description.jp: 神羅カンパニーの元ソルジャーを自称する青年。「星」を守るため 宿敵であるセフィロスを追う旅のなかで 仲間と共に己の過去と向き合い 本来の自分を取り戻してゆく。口癖は「興味ないね」とクールな性格だが 乗り物に弱い。
description.gl: A young man who is a former member of SOLDIER. In pursuing his nemesis, Sephiroth, and attempting to protect his world, he learns the truth of his own past. He often claims to be "not interested"─a notion that is reinforced by his detached demeanor. It is a mask that breaks only when he is overcome by motion sickness.

jp.text: 約束の時間に 遅れたようだ
ここには必要ななにかがある
やるだけは やってみるさ
戦友……かな\n俺たちは信頼しあっていた
俺は 俺の現実を生きる
……仲間を見すてて\n行けるわけがない

gl.text: Looks like I'm a little late.
Looks like I need to go inside...
I'm gonna do whatever I can.
So I guess you'd call us war buddies... We trusted each other.
I'm going to live my life without pretending.

name.gl: コールアビリティ_クラウド
name.jp: コールアビリティ_クラウド

rank_up_desc.en:
When using [Finishing Touch (C)]
• Attack-based BRV gain +10%
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150%
• Deals 20% of total HP damage to non-targets on last HP attack
rank_up_desc.gl:
When using Finishing Touch (C):
 • Slight boost to BRV granted based on ATK
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Deals 20% of cumulative HP damage to non-targets on last HP  attack
rank_up_desc.jp:
「画龍点睛【C】」使用時
・攻撃力依存のBRV加算量小アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
・最後のHP攻撃HIT時
　ターゲット以外にも
　与えた合計HPダメージの20％分のHPダメージ

rank_up_desc.en:
When using [Blade Bleam (C)]
• Becomes 3-HIT AoE ranged BRV attack + ST HP attack delivered twice
• Increases BRV potency by 60%
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 180% Max BRV
• Delay +1 turn
rank_up_desc.gl:
When using Blade Beam (C):
 • 6-hit group ranged BRV  attack + single-target HP  attack becomes 3-hit group ranged BRV  attack + single-target HP  attack delivered 2 times; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%
 • Target delay +1
rank_up_desc.jp:

　3HIT全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋単体HP攻撃を2回行うに変化し

・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの180％分
・対象の行動順を下げる量＋1

desc.en:
When dealing critical hit
• Self: 3 turns Special Effect [Cloudy Wolf]

[Cloudy Wolf]
• Increases HP damage dealt by 20％
• 20％ [MAX BRV Up], 20％ [PHY ATK Up]

When using [Blade Beam]
• Becomes 3-HIT AoE ranged BRV attack + ST HP attack delivered twice
• Increases BRV potency by 60％
desc.gl:
When dealing critical hit:
 • Grants self special effect Cloudy Wolf for 3 turns

When using Blade Beam:
 • 6-hit group ranged BRV attack + single-target HP attack becomes 3-hit group ranged BRV attack + single-target HP attack delivered 2 times; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
desc.jp:
